snippet: The Australian ambassador defends the policy of turning back boats run by human smugglers, and three other Australians offer their views.
lead_paragraph: The Australian ambassador defends the policy of turning back boats run by human smugglers, and three other Australians offer their views.

headline.print_headline: Australia’s Policy on Refugees in Boats
